metadata.title: Phygital Games of the Future
metadata.description: The first ever phygital sports show,combining competitions in physical and digital dimensions.

page_content:
Federation - Games of the Future








  Menu  Profile     English Russian Federation - Games of the Future  


 
 
 The Russian Federationof Phygital Sports     The Russian Federation of Phygital Sports (RFPS) It is a social organization responsible for the development, promotion and organization of mass sports in the format of functional digital all-round event.Its goal — is to support and popularize phygital-sport in Russia to make sure modern athletes are equally successful on the sports arena and in the virtual universe.     The tasks of the federation     Common information platform for a community of like-minded peopleA corps of judges for holding the games in phygital formatRegulatory framework and methodological materialsEducational process on technological sports disciplines (public talks, workshops, opening of chairs on the basis of universities) Interactive conferences, festivals, forums, round-tables, exhibitions, open lectures, master-classes, hackathons etc.International student camps and councilsыDemo-competitions between educational institutions Creation International sports organizations of classic, digital and technological sports disciplines (federations, associations etc.)Organization involved in occupational guidance responsible for youth policies (school students, applicants, students and others)Federal and regional executive organs for the organization and/or participation in grant competitions Cooperation Popularization of phygital-sportExchange of experience and best practicesDevelopment of technological Sports in Russia Participation Development     Contest for developing phygital sport From July 8 till July 29 one can submit an application for the participation in the contest and tell about his project for developing phygital sport in one’s respective city. In September the best of the best will speak at the forum “New Approaches to the year 2022” and get a chance to become a regional affiliate of the All-Russian Federation of Phygital Sport.     The All-Russian Federation of Phygital Sports is being created. Period The World Games of Future announce a contest for the development of phygital sports in Russian regions. Applications for participation are accepted until July 29, 2022.Phygital (Physical + Digital) is a combination of physical and digital – it is the reality in which the modern world has been living for a long time. And sport is no exception. Even the most conservative sports disciplines who stick to traditional ways do not neglect innovations and become more technology-oriented. Therefore the main goal of the contest is to unite like-minded people and introduce a trend for phygitality. The rules of participation are simple: it is necessary to present an idea for developing phygital-sport in one’s region and fill-in the application form on the web-site. The results of the contest will be summed up until August 17. The authors of the best projects will get an opportunity to be at the head of phygital-sport development in their respective region with the support of the Association with Limited Liabilities World Games of Future including the subsequent interaction with the All-Russian Federation of Phygital Sport as a regional affiliate.The inaugural Games of Future in phygital format will be held in 2024 in Kazan. Participants of the tournament will be competing in 16 hybrid disciplines with each of them combining classic sport, eSports or VR-/AR-technology.Throughout the bidding campaign meant to select the host city of the Games of Future several dozens of bids from Russian cities were received. Last June at the St. Petersburg International Economic Forum the deputy chairman of the Russian government Dmitry Chernyshenko pronounced Kazan the winner of the contest for the right to hold the tournament.     Igor Stolyarov,The Project Manager of the Games of Future "The bidding campaign for the right to hold the inaugural games drew interest in dozens of regions, therefore we invite all like-minded people for whom our concept rings a bell to join the phygital movement officially. The range of phygital sports is much broader than the initially developed 16 disciplines, that would be one of the goals of the Russian Federation of Phygital Sports – to discover new hybrid disciplines, create professional leagues for high schools, universities, amateurs and professionals." You can buy tickets now.Phygital Basketball: the Way of the Champion (Russian tournament)The first-ever tournament The Way of a Champion in phygital basketball will be held from October 5 to 8. Eight teams will fight for the Phygital trophy: Liga Pro Team, Liga Pro Team 47, UGRA.Reset, Russian Railways, Rodina Media, Udmurtia team, SFU and Unix.In the first stage, the teams play a basketball video game, then they move to a basketball court. The scores of the digital and physical stages are summed up. In case of a tie, the winner is determined by a series of free throws.Tournament datesGroup stage: 5/6 October 2023Quarter-finals and semi-finals: 7 October 2023Final and battle for third place: 8 October 2023Buy your ticket to The Way of a Champion tournament. page_content:
Draw for the Games of the Future to Take Place at VDNH








  Menu  Profile     English RussianDraw for the Games of the Future to Take Place at VDNH12/13/2023Games of the FutureParticipants in five phygital disciplines of the Games of the Future will find out their opponents this Wednesday, December 20th. On this day at VDNH, the team draw will take place, and the ticketing program for the main sports event of 2024 will be launched.The first draw for the international tournament Games of the Future will take place in Pavilion G "Meeting Place VK." Participants in phygital skateboarding, phygital BMX, phygital fighting, cybathletics, and drone racing will find out their future opponents.The ceremony's guest of honor will be the popular blogger Vlad A4. He will launch an interactive contest for the tournament's followers on social media. The main prize for the winner will be tickets to Kazan for the Games of the Future. Anyone interested can follow the draw and participate in the contest in the Games of the Future community on VK.Draw Schedule:10:00-10:20 – Drone racing10:30-10:50 – Cybathletics 11:00-11:40 – Phygital BMX11:50-12:10 – Phygital Skateboarding12:20-12:50 – Phygital FightingTen Phygital Games were held in Kazan as part of the preparations for the tournament. In Phygital Games participated 178 teams, comprising 1203 participants from 48 countries. The Games of the Future are expected to have around 2000 participants from over 100 countries. The draw procedure in the remaining phygital disciplines of the Games of the Future will take place in January 2024.Media Accreditation:The event is open to media representatives. To receive accreditation, please send your full name, position, media outlet name, and the correspondent's phone number to petrov_kv@imagroup.ru by 17:00 on November 18. For immediate communication, please contact +7 921-427-38-55 (Konstantin).Following the ceremony, media can ask questions to the participants of the draw, guests, and representatives of the Games of the Future. Journalists should gather by 12:00. Entry to the pavilion at other times is by prior arrangement.also 12/2023Draw for the Games of the Future to Take Place at VDNH Games of the Future 11/2023Media accreditation process for the Games of the Future АккредитацияИгры БудущегоСМИ 11/2023Liga Pro Team Secures Spot at the Games of the Future Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023NBSK and Liga Pro Team to Face Off in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Tournament Final Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Tournament Semifinalists Decided in Kazan Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Teams Learn Their Group Stage Opponents Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Zaripov Team will compete in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey... фиджитал-хоккейИгры БудущегоЛига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею 10/2023Liga Pro Team Crowned Champions of the Way of a Champion Phygital Basketball Tournament Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023International Phygital Basketball Teams Determined Group Stage Rivals Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Топ 10/2023Way of a Champion: Unveiling the Playoff Contenders in the Phygital Basketball  Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023Russian Phygital Basketball Players Step Onto the Way of a Champion Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Путь Чемпиона 10/2023Phygital Games 10: Basketball Players Discover Group Stage Opponents ЛучшееФиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10 9/2023Phygital Games 10: How to Get Your Ticket? Международный турнир: фиджитал-баскетболисты узнали соперников по групповому этапу








  Menu  Profile     English RussianInternational Phygital Basketball Teams Determined Group Stage Rivals10/8/2023Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10ТопThe draw procedure for phygital basketball on the eve of the first competitive day of the tenth Phygital Games took place in Kazan. According to the results of the draw, teams of the tournament determined their rivals for the group stage.  The International phygital basketball tournament will take place at the Kazan Expo from October 9 to 12.According to the draw procedure, the pairs were distributed as follows*: Group A* 16:00 RAMBOOT ESPORTS vs MDMX 17:05 Alov Basket vs BROTHERHOOD SQUADGroup B*18:10 Club Sololá Guatemala vs Partizan Esports19:15 EASYBASKET ACADEMY vs EXPT*Games are held in the followed by format.The competition consists of two stages. First, the teams play in a basketball simulator, then move to a real court, where they play 2x2 basketball. The scores of the two stages are summed up. In case of a tie, the winner is determined by a series of free throws.The International phygital basketball tournament is held within the framework of the tenth Phygital Games at the Kazan Expo, Kazan. The total prize fund amounts to 4 million rubles, of which 1,4 million rubles will go to the winners. Tickets can be purchased on the kassir.ru website.During the tenth Phygital Games the competition program featured five phygital disciplines: phygital basketball, phygital football, computer games CS:GO and Warface combined with laser tag and Mobile Legends: Bang Bang online tournament. Athletes from China, Spain, Turkey, Belarus, Azerbaijan and other countries will participate in the Games. page_content:
Top, Топ








  Menu  Profile     English RussianWay of a Champion: Unveiling the Playoff Contenders in the Phygital Basketball 10/6/2023Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетболТопTopIn Kazan, the group stage of the phygital basketball tournament has come to a close, revealing the contenders advancing to the playoffs. Quarterfinal and semifinal duels are set for October 7th at the Kazan Expo.По итогам второго дня шесть команд вышли в плей-офф, а RFSO Lokomotiv и UGRA. Reset проиграли свои матчи и покидают турнир. По правилам фиджитал-баскетбола команды должны сначала показать навыки игры в баскетбольном симуляторе, затем на паркете сыграть в баскетбол 2х2. Победитель определяется по сумме заброшенных мячей на обоих этапах.RFSO Lokomotiv 20:31 RODINA MEDIAThe group stage matches started with a clash between RFSO Lokomotiv and RODINA MEDIA, both vying for third place in Group A. The teams' fights were tied on the digital court, each trying to gain the advantage with long-range shots. Yet, RODINA MEDIA showcased superior play, closing out the virtual stage with a 12:16 win. Their dominance persisted on the LED court, where they executed tenacious defense, sleek maneuvers around opponents, and pinpoint accuracy from deep. he match ended 20:31, propelling RODINA MEDIA into the quarterfinals and sending RFSO Lokomotiv home."Towards the end, we shifted to playing for the spectators - finessing, launching threes, executing spins. The scoreboard gave us that liberty, having established a robust lead. It morphed into a starkly grueling game, abundant with physical confrontations, the ball practically peeled from hands. For us, it was the match of our lives - a defeat would relegate us to mere sightseers. Undoubtedly, Kazan offers picturesque allure, but our foremost journey here was in the pursuit of victory, with all else following. Bowing out of such a premier tournament post the group stage was not penned in our plans," shared Alexandra Petrunenko, a player from the RODINA MEDIA team.Despite their defeat, the basketball players from Krasnodar remained satisfied with their participation in the tenth Phygital Games."I'm pleased with the tournament itself, and it's delightful that we were invited. Everything was interesting and cool, and this game has brought me only positive emotions. I enjoyed both the digital and physical parts. The matches were very exciting, the opponents were great, and everything went well."Alexey ZhdankoRFSO Lokomotiv captainUGRA. Reset 19:28 SFUUGRA. Reset and SFU battled for the third place in Group B. The team from Krasnoyarsk rectified previous mistakes, with Egor Zheludov EGA soloing on the digital court, scoring 14 points. The game concluded with a 1:16 scoreline. Although the Ugra basketball players kicked off the physical stage with gusto, regaining 7 points in just a few minutes, the tail end of the game favored the Siberian team, ending 19:28. SFU advances to the quarterfinals, while UGRA. Reset exits the tournament."Opponents were wary strong. This is no longer a regional level, everything is very serious, especially the organization - they've secured a wonderful arena. I think this might be my first time in such huge venues, it's really cool. We will continue to fight. I am always set on winning, no matter who plays against me," said Egor Zheludov EGA, an SFU team player."In the digital stage, we made mistakes with our picks, choosing the wrong ones. As a result, we utterly failed to play effectively. We simply collapsed. A 15-point deficit is too significant to overcome on the court. Overall, the game didn’t go as we had planned. It was a complete disaster. Theoretically, it's possible to recover 15 points, but it's extremely difficult. However, we didn’t lose faith in ourselves and continued to fight," highlighted Oleg Malutin, the captain of the UGRA.Reset team.UNICS 25:32 Liga Pro TeamUNICS and Liga Pro Team contended for the leadership in Group A. Mikhail Panchenko BigBabyMish from Liga Pro Team, displayed exquisite basketball on the virtual court, scoring 15 points. The digital part concluded with a 9:16 scoreline. Liga Pro Team continued to showcase their prowess on the LED court: stunning plays and powerful throws by Shalva Shatashvili Shell kept their opponents on edge. Everything pointed towards a confident victory for Liga Pro Team. In the final moments, Shell sealed the win with a signature long-range shot, bringing the score to 25:32. Liga Pro Team advances to the semifinals, while UNICS will compete in the quarterfinals."To be honest, esports only entered my life recently, when I arrived at the tournament. Before this, I’d only ever played games like 'Spider-Man' or soccer. But now, I've logged more console time in these past few days than in the last five years. Phygital is a really interesting extension of esports." Shalva Shatashvili ShellLiga Pro Team player"Our digital stage didn't pan out; we gave our opponents a big head start. On the court, we committed many fouls, and the guys from St. Petersburg made their shots, so we were close, but they ultimately triumphed. No worries, we'll try to correct our mistakes tomorrow. We'll just have to play two games," stated Ilya Rusakov, captain of UNICS.U.R. 32:30 Liga Pro Team 47U.R. and Liga Pro Team 47  battled for the top spot in Group B. In the digital stage, Nikita Savchenkov TiGeR_lRls from Liga Pro Team 47 showcased a stellar performance, scoring 14 points throughout the stage (10:16). On the basketball court, the players from U.R. managed to enforce a competitive struggle against their opponents and evened the score at 30:30. The winner was determined in the final seconds when Vladislav Bechkov Bandit secured U.R. a spot in the semifinals with a long-range shot. This marks the first time in the tournament that a team has claimed victory after falling in the digital part."For the second time, we're bouncing back, demonstrating character in the finale – it was very challenging," says Bogdan Necheporenko, a player for U.R. "We knew that the opponents were esports players, and the goal was to maintain a minimal gap with them. We understood that, most likely, we would lose on the console, but we were confident that we would handle things on the court. We secured the victory because we have Vladislav Bechkov, who can nail a three-pointer when it matters most."The group stage has concluded, revealing the playoff contenders. On October 7th, six teams will continue their battle for the main trophy of the tenth Phygital Games.Quarterfinal 12:00 Liga Pro Team 47 vs RODINA MEDIA13:05 UNICS vs SFUSemifinal 18:00 U.R. vs TBD19:05 Liga Pro Team vs TBDThe Way of a Champion phygital basketball tournament is held within the framework of the tenth Phygital Games at the Kazan Expo, Kazan. The total prize fund amounts to 1.25 million rubles. A breathtaking live spectacle with a vast program of additional events for athletes and spectators. 10+ competition days A single competition combining both classic sports and esports.  21 disciplines World-class athletes and esportsmen  2000 participants Fighting to win the incredible prize pool! 260+ teams   The Games of the Future in the heart of Kazan The first Games of the Future is set to debut in Kazan on Feb 21-Mar 3, 2024, in the Russian city of Kazan. Liga Pro Team – победитель турнира Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею








  Menu  Profile     English RussianLiga Pro Team завоевали путевку на Игры Будущего11/24/2023Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккейВ Казани завершился турнир Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею. Liga Pro Team выиграла главный трофей и квоту на Игры Будущего, команда NBSK заняла второе место, тройку замкнул HC BUTYRKA.Хоккей в фиджитал-формате проверит навыки спортсменов как в хоккейном симуляторе, так и на хоккейной площадке в формате 3х3. Победитель определяется по сумме заброшенных шайб на двух этапах. Смотри видео о правилах дисциплины.1/4NBSK 7:9 Liga Pro TeamВ Казань команды привезли сильных игроков по хоккейному симулятору, которые помогли им добраться до финала. Игра на приставке получилась быстрой и динамичной. Первая тройка NBSK быстро забросила две шайбы, но Liga Pro Team вскоре сравняла счет, а в заключительном периоде ушла в отрыв – 5:2.На льду игру диктовали хоккеисты NBSK – 11:0 по броскам в первом периоде, из которых в ворота залетела лишь одна. За несколько секунд до сирены Владислав Короткий открыл счет. Во втором периоде NBSK практически сравняли счет, но игроки Liga Pro Team смогли собраться и переломить ход матча, к перерыву счет стал 7:4 в их пользу. В третьем периоде NBSK боролись до самого конца, но догнать соперника не смогли. Liga Pro Team победили со счетом 9:7 и завоевали путевку на Игры Будущего.«Мы старались не давать сопернику пространства, чтобы удержать счет, и контролировали игру. Стиль игры от периода к периоду у нас менялся, ребята у нас профи, все играли на высоком уровне и умеют перестраиваться по схеме, которую им описывает тренер. NBSK – наши принципиальные соперники. Их игры мы разбирали постоянно, и матч с ними был достоин финала», – рассказал Даниил Зак, игрок Liga Pro Team.«Парни заряжены на атаку, поэтому вратаря старались не нагружать, давали ему отдохнуть, он много сегодня сделал. У нас была задача сравнять счет и выйти вперед. Конечно, мы должны были забивать больше», – отметил Максим Труханов, игрок NBSK.1/4RFSO Lokomotiv 5:8 HC BUTYRKAОбе команды по ходу турнира жаловались на недостаток подготовки в цифровой части, при этом демонстрировали качественную игру на льду. Поэтому ожидалось, что судьба третьего места решится на реальной площадке. Так и получилось: впервые на турнире цифровой этап закончился вничью – 4:4.Начало матча было равным – BUTYRKA атаковала, но первыми забили игроки Loko. В середине второго периода хоккеисты HC BUTYRKA не только сравняли счет, но и вышли вперед – 7:5. В конце матча Loko пытался отыграть отставание и снял вратаря, но пропустил шайбу в пустые ворота. HC BUTYRKA выиграла 8:5 и заняла третье место.«Максимально положительные эмоции от выхода на лед с равным счетом, хотя, конечно, хотелось иметь преимущество. Первое время не очень везло, несколько раз попадали в штангу, и вратарь у противника играет отлично, но мы были настроены дожимать. Когда счет был 4:5, мы не волновались, потому что были лучше готовы физически, чем и воспользовались. В итоге стали единственной командой, которая выиграла все матчи на льду. Если бы мы лучше подготовились к симулятору, нам не было бы равных. У нас в составе не было киберспортсменов, как у всех остальных», – поделился Максим Гончаренко, игрок HC BUTYRKA .«Противники нарастили темп за второй период, в первом не так быстро бегали. Они начали реализовывать моменты, в то время как мы плохо сыграли в обороне. Особенно тяжело было вратарю, ему досталось много сильных бросков с близкой дистанции. В заключительной семиминутке мы решили отдать все силы и навязать борьбу. Силы еще были, хотя сказался последний матч турнира, мы немного подустали», – рассказал Владимир Опарко, игрок команды RFSO Lokomotiv.1/23Frenzy 14:6 ZaryaDЦифровой этап матча за пятое место шел ровно пока в концовке игроки 3Frenzy не перехватили инициативу – 6:2. На площадке команда Евгения Крутикова выступила не менее уверенно – игроки 3Frenzy сделали восемь точных бросков, на что ZaryaD смог забросить лишь четыре шайбы. «В Казань ехали за большим, но получили урок, будем исправлять ошибки. В конце первого периода второго матча группового этапа мы сняли вратаря, забили и на кураже побежали забивать еще, но пропустили в пустые ворота и игры посыпалась. Это был ключевой момент на турнире. Мы хотели сыграть красиво, а сопернику повезло, что сказалось на наших эмоциях. Все команды поняли, что нужно быть сильными не только на льду, но и на приставке», – поделился впечатлениями Андрей Максимов, капитан команды 3Frenzy.«Классный уровень организации турнира, сильные соперники. На следующие турниры нам нужно подтянуть киберспортсменов, без них тяжело. Сам я, к примеру, на приставке вообще не играю», – рассказал Амир Загидуллин, хоккеист команды ZaryaD.also 12/2023На ВДНХ пройдет жеребьевка участников Игр Будущего Игры Будущего 12/2023Открытая NBSK и Liga Pro Team – финалисты турнира по фиджитал-хоккею в Казани








  Menu  Profile     English RussianNBSK and Liga Pro Team to Face Off in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Tournament Final11/24/2023Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккейThe finalists in Kazan for the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament have been determined. NBSK and RFSO Lokomotiv, Liga Pro Team and HC BUTYRKA battled it out for a spot in the final. The tournament winner and the holder of the spot for the Games of the Future 2024 will be decided tonight.Phygital hockey tests athletes' skills both in the hockey simulator and on the 3x3 hockey rink. The winner is determined by the total goals scored in both stages. Watch the video about the rules of the discipline.1/4NBSK 12:4 RFSO LokomotivTeam NBSK, before the start of the tournament, mentioned that they were focusing on the digital part. Their plan worked in the semifinals, giving Lokomotiv no chance – the opponents hit the ice with a score of 8:0. In the physical stage, NBSK played solidly and maintained their lead. The on-ice encounter ended in a 4:4 draw, with NBSK captain Andrey Maksimov and railroader Dmitry Bystrov each scoring twice."Our goal was to create a lead on the console and then comfortably play it out on the ice, which is what we ultimately did. We achieved a score of 8:0 in the digital stage, didn't let anything through, which is important, and then we didn't even aim to draw the game; we just played open hockey and enjoyed ourselves, and the plan worked. Going forward, we want to keep winning. We came here for victory, made it to the final, and it's all in our hands now. If we avoid mistakes, we'll leave as champions," shared his thoughts Vladislav Korotkiy, a hockey player from NBSK."Our task was to maintain the advantage in the physical part, we couldn't afford to lose on the ice. But we managed that. We conceded the fourth goal towards the end, so we didn't pull the goalie. Now we'll rest, train a bit more in the digital part, and compete for third place," said Daniil Surkanov, a player from RFSO Lokomotiv.1/4Liga Pro Team 14:7 HC BUTYRKAIn the digital stage, Liga Pro Team confirmed their status as tournament favorites – leading 10:2. The hockey players from BUTYRKA were only able to put up resistance in the second period, which ended in a 1:1 draw.The first period on the ice marked with six penalty shots, but none were converted! Goalkeepers Nikolay Shashkov (Liga Pro Team) and Yuri Sirotkin (BUTYRKA) played brilliantly. In total, there were 11 penalty shots in the match, with only three being successfully executed – all by BUTYRKA players. Going into the third period, BUTYRKA managed to reduce the score to six goals, but they couldn't catch up to their opponent. In the final part, Liga Pro Team played well in defense and accurately shot at the empty net. Liga Pro Team won with a score of 14:7."The opponent provoked us in the first period of the physical stage. Of course, we knew about their style since yesterday and prepared while conducting our analysis. But their players and ours was emotional. The victory was confident by the score, but we still have aspects to work on in the game. Overall, phygital hockey needs time for hockey players to improve in the digital part, so there aren't such eight-goal gaps when hitting the ice. Any hockey player can easily learn the simulator, especially if they played games in their childhood," shared Sergey Filippov, a player from Liga Pro Team."Again, we were up against a team with professional esports players. You see the audience's reaction in the stands; everyone is supporting us. After the first period, we made the score 10:4, then reduced the gap in the second and continued to push forward. The guys from NBSK in the stands were cheering for us; we know them well, they really wish us victory, and not just them. We react extremely emotionally to all our successes, not just to celebrate, but to create a show for the audience and to draw the opponent into the emotions," told Maxim Goncharenko, a hockey player from BUTYRKA.Tonight, on November 24th, the winner of the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament will be determined.3-rd place match19:30 RFSO Lokomotiv vs HC BUTYRKAFinals21:00 NBSK vs Liga Pro TeamThe Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament is taking place at the Tatneft Arena ice palace from November 23 to 24 in Kazan. page_content:
В Казани стартовал турнир «Путь Чемпиона» по фиджитал-баскетболу








  Menu  Profile     English RussianRussian Phygital Basketball Players Step Onto the Way of a Champion10/5/2023Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаТопThe Way of a Champion phygital basketball tournament has kicked off in Kazan. Competitions taking place from October 5th to 8th. The eight best Russian teams have entered the battle for the main trophy of the tenth Phygital Games.В первый день прошли матчи группового этапа. По правилам фиджитал-баскетбола команды должны сначала показать навыки игры в баскетбольном симуляторе, затем на паркете сыграть в баскетбол 2х2. Победитель определяется по сумме заброшенных мячей на обоих этапах.GROUP AUNICS 31:21 RFSO LokomotivThe phygital basketball tournament was inaugurated with a match between UNICS and RFSO Lokomotiv. The digital stage unfolded tightly, with neither team wanting to concede. A precise series of long-range shots allowed the team from Kazan to pull ahead (15:11). In the physical part, UNICS basketball players operated deftly under the hoop, played qualitatively in defence, and Ilya Rusakov Toretto accurate throws secured the victory for the Kazan team."We have been preparing for the program almost all our lives, and have been mastering the digital part over the last few weeks. Today's match showed that we prepared quite well. We felt confident both on the court and in the digital world. The match was cool. The event is very well organized — these are real competitions, not a show. We felt the heat of the struggle from beginning to end, both on the court and at the monitor," said Dmitry Khairutdinov Harris, a UNICS player.RODINA MEDIA 17:31 Liga Pro TeamIn the second match of the group, RODINA MEDIA and Liga Pro Team clashed. Mikhail Panchenko BigBabyMish from Liga Pro Team soloed in the digital part: executing beautiful block shots, smartly reading the game of an opponent, and scoring 15 points in the attack. The virtual match ended with a score of 9:15. In the physical part, street basketball master Shalva Shatashvili Shell fortified the Liga Pro Team's advantage with powerful free throws. "It's unusual sensations. I've never had such an experience before. And overall, it's my first time performing in such a format in front of an audience. I'm glad that the team won, but I admit, we mainly prepared for the esports part because organizing training there is much easier." Mikhail  Panchenko BigBabyMishLiga Pro Team playerGROUP BU.R. 31:29 UGRA. ResetMatches in the second group were kicked off with a match between U.R. and UGRA. Reset. In the digital part both teams playing on equal grounds, yet the U.R. squad proved to be more precise and fortunate (16:10). During the break before the physical part, the athletes from Yugra regrouped and quickly seized the initiative on the court. Everything pointed towards a victory of the UGRA. Reset, but in the crucial moment, accurate shots from Vladislav Bechkov Badit of U.R brought the team victory — 31:29. "I don't remember how many three-pointers I scored today. Maybe the echpochmak [a traditional Tatar pastry] that I ate before the game helped. I scored so much, and I only ate one. Next time I'll eat two!" shared U.R. team player Vladislav Bechkov Badit.He also noted that during the preparation for the digital part, his team studied the playing style and even the behavior of the opponent: "In esports, the approach is entirely different. You analyze the opponent, adapt, and try playing with different pairs. In this, we are assisted by two sparring partners who are with us now. Today, we were ready for the Shaq - Steph duo and accomplished the task almost by 90%."SFU 33:34 Liga Pro Team 47The final match of the game day turned out to be tense, where the Siberian Federal University team SFU faced Liga Pro Team 47. Liga Pro Team 47 confidently conducted the digital part, securing a 10-point advantage before the second stage (5:15).In the physical part, Liga Pro Team 47 continued to dominate. It seemed that the match would end soon, but SFU players began to slowly and confidently reduce the gap. The battle was intense, the basketball players fouled a lot, and moreover, after another collision, SFU player Alexey Zuev got injured, leaving the team without substitutions.The main time of the match ended in a draw (28:28). The outcome of the duel was determined by a series of a free throws. Here, accuracy and luck were on the side of Liga Pro Team 47, who outscored their opponents by one point. The match ended with a score of 33:34."Our opponent is much more experienced on the court - they are stronger, faster, and more mobile. We have a versatile lineup: we can play equally in digital and physical. That’s why such a battle took place. Today we played very contact-heavy, I think it might have seemed from the side that we would even fight (Laughs). Of course, that wouldn't have happened, but what does this tell us? Phygital tournaments, in terms of intensity and struggle, are in no way inferior to other sports."Nikita Savchenkov TiGeR_IRIsLiga Pro Team 47 captainThe player also paid attention to the LED court: "Certainly, it's unusual – you look down and see your pulse line there, something lights up, some animations. It's not customary, but it's very cool. This is a step forward in terms of technology. In any case, you get a wow-effect. I believe it’s much better than the classic hardwood. I'll add that the rebound is the same."The first day of the tournament has defined the leaders and underdogs within the groups. Tomorrow, the concluding matches of the group stage will take place, determining the participants for the playoffs.Group А*16:00 RFSO Lokomotiv vs RODINA MEDIA18:10 UNICS vs Liga Pro TeamGroup В*17:05 UGRA. Reset vs SFU19:15 U.R. vs Liga Pro Team 47*Matches are held in the followed by format.The Way of a Champion phygital basketball tournament is held within the framework of the tenth Phygital Games at the Kazan Expo, Kazan. The total prize fund amounts to 1.25 million rubles. Tickets can be purchased on the  kassir.ru website.also 12/2023Draw for the Games of the Future to Take Place at VDNH Games of the Future 11/2023Media accreditation process for the Games of the Future АккредитацияИгры БудущегоСМИ 11/2023Liga Pro Team Secures Spot at the Games of the Future Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023NBSK and Liga Pro Team to Face Off in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Tournament Final Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Tournament Semifinalists Decided in Kazan Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Teams Learn Their Group Stage Opponents Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Zaripov Team will compete in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey... фиджитал-хоккейИгры БудущегоЛига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею 10/2023Liga Pro Team Crowned Champions of the Way of a Champion Phygital Basketball Tournament Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023International Phygital Basketball Teams Determined Group Stage Rivals Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Топ 10/2023Way of a Champion: Unveiling the Playoff Contenders in the Phygital Basketball  Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023Russian Phygital Basketball Players Step Onto the Way of a Champion Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Путь Чемпиона 10/2023Phygital Games 10: Basketball Players Discover Group Stage Opponents ЛучшееФиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10 9/2023Phygital Games 10: How to Get Your Ticket? page_content: Menu  Profile     English RussianPhygital Hockey Teams Learn Their Group Stage Opponents11/22/2023Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккейThe draw procedure for the  Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament on the eve of the first competitive day took place in Kazan. According to the results of the draw, teams of the tournament determined their rivals for the group stage. The phygital hockey tournament (hockey simulator + hockey 3v3) will be held at the Tatneft Arena from November 23 to 24.According to the draw procedure, the pairs were distributed as follows*:Group A*12:00 3FRENZY vs HC BUTYRKA15:00 HC BUTYRKA vs NBSK18:00 NBSK vs 3FRENZYGroup B*13:30 Liga Pro Team vs ZaryaD16:30 ZaryaD vs RFSO Lokomotiv19:30 RFSO Lokomotiv vs Liga Pro Team*Games are held in the followed by format.The phygital hockey competition consists of two stages. First, teams compete in a hockey simulator, then they move to the ice rink. The goals scored in both stages are summed up. In the event of a tie, the winner is determined in a shootout. Watch a video about the rules of phygital hockey.The Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament is taking place at the Tatneft Arena from November 23 to 24 in Kazan. Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею: обзор группового этапа








  Menu  Profile     English RussianPhygital Hockey Tournament Semifinalists Decided in Kazan11/23/2023Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккейThe  Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament has kicked off in Kazan. On the first day, six teams played their group stage matches. Tomorrow, November 24th, the tournament winner and the holder of the spot for the Games of the Future 2024 will be determined.Phygital hockey tests athletes' skills both in the hockey simulator and on the 3x3 hockey rink. The winner is determined by the total goals scored in both stages. Watch the video about the rules of the discipline.Group A1/33FRENZY 7:6 HC BUTYRKAIn the first match of the tournament, HC BUTYRKA faced off against team 3Frenzy, which finished third in the summer phygital hockey tournament in Kazan. At the start of the digital part, neither team could gain an advantage, but in the second period, 3Frenzy pulled ahead with a score of 6:3. On the ice, the score was only opened towards the end of the first period, with 3Frenzy's player Alexander Ovanov managing to score against the opposing team. In the second period, HC BUTYRKA launched three successful attacks in a few minutes, narrowing the gap to 6:7. However, the score remained unchanged until the end of the match – 3Frenzy secured their first victory of the tournament."We were focusing on ice hockey. We know the guys from 3Frenzy and their play style, so we adjusted to it to score. I like the tournament; the organization is great. But of course, we would have liked to win," shared Maxim Goncharenko, a player from HC BUTYRKA."It feels great to play, although it's a bit challenging. During our training, the rink was smaller, so playing here is tougher and unfamiliar. Plus, we have seven players in our team, while HC BUTYRKA has nine. A three-goal lead in the digital stage is good, but we aimed for more, at least 5-6. Nevertheless, the first goal by Sasha Ovanov inspired us; scoring first on the ice is important," shared Daniil Shabarov, a player from 3Frenzy.1/3HC BUTYRKA 4:3 NBSKThe match turned out to be tense and unpredictable. There was a lot of struggle on the ice, but it did not affect the scoring. NBSK had talked about focusing on the digital stage before the tournament, but they couldn't gain a significant advantage in the hockey simulator – ending up with a 2:1 lead in their favor. On the ice, the opponents also showed an equal game, in which HC BUTYRKA proved to be slightly more successful – 3:1 on the real rink and 4:3 in the match overall."We played against a team with many esports players. Our task in the digital stage was to keep the score tight, concede as few goals as possible, and then prove our advantage on the ice. Typically, teams with many console players have fewer who play hockey. So, we use our advantage – dominating on the rink. And this was evident to the spectators in both the first and the second game – HC BUTYRKA dominates on the ice. We proved that we are worthy of the final and victory. Let all the esports players fear us," shared Maxim Goncharenko, a player from HC BUTYRKA."The guys didn't do well in the digital stage, but we still started on the ice with a slight advantage. We made mistakes and were penalized for them, and it was hard to catch up after that. We gave it our all, and now we'll work on our mistakes to be in better shape for the next match, both in the digital and the physical stages," shared Andrey Maksimov, the captain of NBSK.1/3NBSK 13:5 3FRENZYIn the second match, NBSK was able to showcase their strength in the digital stage. The game was almost one-sided with a score of 6:1. The start of the physical stage went fairly well for 3Frenzy – the team employed a risky tactic with four outfield players and no goalie, managing to score two goals. However, the advantage then shifted back to NBSK, who skillfully bypassed defenders and scored into the empty net. The match ended with a score of 10:3. NBSK took first place in their group, while 3Frenzy will play in the match for fifth place."The match was tough, and it was difficult to play on the ice, but thanks to our esports players who gave us a good head start in the digital stage. Eventually, the opponent had to open up and pull their goalie, allowing us to score many in the empty net. 3Frenzy is a good team with excellent guys who play in the 3x3 league. Now, our main rival is HC BUTYRKA. We lost to them in the first match, and now we're hoping to meet them in the final," commented Andrey Maksimov, a player from NBSK."The opposing team played a tight game, trying to keep the puck. So, we brought out four outfield players to take the puck and capitalize on our opportunities. It was a risk, but the opponent shot four times into the empty net and scored every time," explained Alexander Zverev, a player from 3Frenzy.Group B1/3Liga Pro Team 14:5 ZaryaDIn the first period, the players of Liga Pro Team brought the score to 4:0. The players of the Kazan team tried to put up a fight, but the virtual ice encounter ended with a victory for Liga Pro Team - 11:4.The first goal of the physical stage was scored by Artur Zaripov, a player for ZaryaD and the son of three-time world champion Danis Zaripov. Liga Pro Team didn't allow their opponent to score any more goals. In the remaining time of the match, three unanswered goals flew into ZaryaD's net – 14:5 in favor of Liga Pro Team."From the very beginning, we were confident of victory, our task was to get a feel for the game, as we hadn't played 3x3 on a large rink before. By the middle of the second period, we were running out of energy, so we started to change every 30 seconds, like in real hockey. I had never played the hockey simulator before, but I managed to score. Still, I understood the game, and the guys shared some tips, so I was able to score a hat-trick in the digital stage," shared Pavel Zdunov, a player from Liga Pro Team."We failed the digital stage; the opponent was stronger. We were hoping to catch up on the ice. Overall, our strategy was to start fast to score the necessary number of goals, but a disallowed goal threw us off," commented Ruzal Galeev, a forward from ZaryaD.1/3ZaryaD 7:8 RFSO LokomotivIn the match for a playoff spot, ZaryaD performed excellently at the beginning of the digital stage – leading 4:1. But then, the third line of RFSO Lokomotiv helped to turn the tide of the game, finishing the stage on the virtual ice with a score of 5:4 in their favor.On the real rink, Artur Zaripov of team ZaryaD once again opened the scoring, but the railwaymen responded with two goals. With just 6 seconds left before the final siren, ZaryaD scored their seventh goal, but they couldn't bring the game to a tie and force a shootout. RFSO Lokomotiv won with a score of 8:7, and after two defeats, ZaryaD lost their chance to advance to the playoffs."We have a well-balanced team. The guys prepared for the hockey simulator advised us on how to play on the console, and we gave them tips on how to act on the ice. We prepared seriously and for a long time because we knew that Liga Pro Team has strong players in both the digital and physical stages. Since they won their first match, our task was to take the game from ZaryaD and then fight for the first place. Overall, the emotions were positive after every goal, both in the digital and physical parts. Although I haven’t managed to score on the console yet, I’ll make up for it," shared Daniil Surkanov, an athlete from RFSO Lokomotiv."Towards the end of the first period on the ice, we seemed to relax and made two mistakes that led to two goals. Probably, an excessive desire to score more and lead in the score played a role. The opponent was unknown to us; we had no idea about their style, so we played as best as we could," said Ruzal Galeev, a player from ZaryaD.1/3RFSO Lokomotiv 3:12 Liga Pro TeamThe match for first place in Group B started with a confident performance by Liga Pro Team on the virtual rink. The players managed to secure a nine-goal lead – 10:1. On the ice, the teams played to maintain the score. Liga Pro Team brought the match to a victory and took first place in the group."Honestly, it was tough. We prepared extensively, but there are still nuances we don't understand in the digital stage and on the rink. I can't say what will happen tomorrow, because all four teams that made it to the playoffs are quite strong, both on the console and on the ice. We will fight and show our best game," commented Yevgeny Bubyakin, a player from RFSO Lokomotiv."In the digital part, we played well and created a good lead. Our goal was to win and get some positive emotions, and the fact that we also came out of the group in first place is great. It doesn't matter who we meet in the semifinals, the main thing is to enjoy hockey and the game," said Anton Pervov, a player from Liga Pro Team.On November 24th, the semifinal matches will take place and the winner of the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament will be determined.Semi-finals 10:00 NBSK vs RFSO Lokomotiv 11:30 Liga Pro Team vs HC BUTYRKA* *The match start time is approximate. Games are conducted in a "followed by" format. Fifth place match 14:00 3FRENZY vs ZaryaDThe Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament is taking place at the Tatneft Arena from November 23 to 24 in Kazan. The total prize pool amounts to 1 million rubles.Watch the live stream of the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament on our website.also 12/2023Draw for the Games of the Future to Take Place at VDNH Games of the Future 11/2023Media accreditation process for the Games of the Future АккредитацияИгры БудущегоСМИ 11/2023Liga Pro Team Secures Spot at the Games of the Future Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023NBSK and Liga Pro Team to Face Off in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Tournament Final Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Tournament Semifinalists Decided in Kazan Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Teams Learn Their Group Stage Opponents Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Zaripov Team will compete in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey... фиджитал-хоккейИгры БудущегоЛига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею 10/2023Liga Pro Team Crowned Champions of the Way of a Champion Phygital Basketball Tournament Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023International Phygital Basketball Teams Determined Group Stage Rivals Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Топ 10/2023Way of a Champion: Unveiling the Playoff Contenders in the Phygital Basketball  Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023Russian Phygital Basketball Players Step Onto the Way of a Champion Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Путь Чемпиона 10/2023Phygital Games 10: Basketball Players Discover Group Stage Opponents ЛучшееФиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10 9/2023Phygital Games 10: How to Get Your Ticket?   Menu  Profile     English RussianPhygital battle at the University Sports Festival8/23/2023Игры БудущегоУниверситетский спортНовостиПресс-релизыЕкатеринбургДмитрий ЧернышенкоJust DanceПерсоналииThe International University Sports Festival is taking place in Yekaterinburg, where professional athletes from around the world can experience the sports of the future.On the outdoor stage of the sports village, there is a platform for a phygital battle, where athletes can prove themselves in phygital basketball (a combination of a sports simulator and 3v3 basketball) or test their dance skills in the #justdance discipline "Dance in phygital style.""Phygital sport is now represented at all international tournaments in Russia. It is a new trend that, I am confident, has a future in world sports. Phygital sport is about harmonious development, it offers different challenges, and everyone will find something they enjoy. As early as next year, the first Games of the Future will be held in Kazan, where 16 different disciplines will be showcased. I hope to see the athletes from the festival as guests, volunteers, or tournament participants." Dmitry  ChernyshenkoDeputy Chairman of the Government The International University Sports Festival is taking place in Yekaterinburg from August 19th to 31st. Teams from BRICS, SCO, and CIS countries have come to the tournament to determine the strongest in 14 sports: badminton, 3x3 basketball, boxing, volleyball, judo, mini-football, table tennis, swimming, diving, sambo, wrestling, tennis, taekwondo, and artistic gymnastics.also 12/2023Draw for the Games of the Future to Take Place at VDNH Games of the Future 11/2023Media accreditation process for the Games of the Future АккредитацияИгры БудущегоСМИ 11/2023Liga Pro Team Secures Spot at the Games of the Future Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023NBSK and Liga Pro Team to Face Off in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Tournament Final Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Tournament Semifinalists Decided in Kazan Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Teams Learn Their Group Stage Opponents Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Zaripov Team will compete in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey... фиджитал-хоккейИгры БудущегоЛига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею 10/2023Liga Pro Team Crowned Champions of the Way of a Champion Phygital Basketball Tournament Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023International Phygital Basketball Teams Determined Group Stage Rivals Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Топ 10/2023Way of a Champion: Unveiling the Playoff Contenders in the Phygital Basketball  Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023Russian Phygital Basketball Players Step Onto the Way of a Champion Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Путь Чемпиона 10/2023Phygital Games 10: Basketball Players Discover Group Stage Opponents ЛучшееФиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10 9/2023Phygital Games 10: How to Get Your Ticket? Media accreditation process for the Games of the Future








  Menu  Profile     English RussianMedia accreditation process for the Games of the Future11/28/2023АккредитацияИгры БудущегоСМИThe press accreditation process for the Games of the Future has started for journalists, bloggers, and influencers. The accreditation is required for covering the events that will take place in Kazan in February-March 2024.Accreditation began on November 20, 2023, and will continue until February 5, 2024.For international media representatives, accreditation must be completed by January 21, 2024, if they require an invitation letter for obtaining a Russian visa.You can apply for accreditation and fill out the required form in the "Press Center" section on our website. After completing the application, a link to a personal account, where you can track the status of your application, will be sent to the email address provided during the application process.Accreditation category1. For submitting applications for for multiple journalists from one media. On the website, you need to select the form "for media representatives with a list of several journalists from the publication". After verification of all data, a link to a personal account will be sent to the email, where you can independently enter all participants according to the selected quota.For individual completion by a journalist.For bloggers and influencers.(These categories will be considered individually according to the regulations established by the organizing committee).To apply for accreditation, influencers and journalists need to fill out all fields in the form, including the "additional information" section. You can familiarize yourself with the accreditation rules and conduct at the Games of the Future venues by following the links provided at the end of the form.If you have any questions regarding accreditation, visa support, customs procedures, accommodation in media hotels, arrivals and departures at official points of entry, equipment registration with RES, or transportation for media representatives in Kazan during the Games of the Future, please send your inquiries to: Menu  Profile     English Russian Partners 


 

 partners       Реклама. ПАО «Газпром» Title sponsor  Gazprom Gazprom is a global energy company, a world leader in natural gas. Half a million employees work all over the country to make clean energy from the bowels of the earth available to as many people as possible. Gazprom also fills our country with the energy of sports. It builds modern sports facilities, supports amateur and professional sports, competitions of the highest level and, of course, the «Games of the Future».   Реклама. ОАО «РЖД» Official partner  Russian Railways The “Games of the Future” Official Partner is Russian Railways JSC. It is one of the world’s largest railway companies with immense passenger and freight transportation flow. Apart from highly qualified specialists the company also possesses a large scientific and technical base, design and construction capacities, considerable experience in international cooperation and pays great attention to the development and support of Russian sport.   Реклама. ПАО «Газпром нефть»  The Gazpromneft fuel station network has more than 1470 filling stations in Russia. These are high-tech complexes with a multi-stage fuel quality control system. You can enjoy having a cup of branded coffee and a bite to eat as well as getting everything you need on the road including products under own brand names Gazpromneft and G-Drive at the network of cafes and shops at Gazpromneft fuel stations. Реклама. ПАО «Газпром нефть» Strategic partner Gazprom neft G-Drive is Gazprom Neft's flagship brand represented at its fuel stations and covering key product and service categories from high-tech fuel and motor oil to beverages, consumer goods and Company-operated G-Drive cafes. Strategic partner  Gazprom neft G-Drive continuously supports sports events, teams and athletes in Russia, and also unites the sports community to address important social issues.   Реклама. ООО «Скартел» General telecommunications partner Yota Yota is a federal mobile operator. We provide voice communication services and Internet access in 2G/3G/4G networks.    Реклама. ООО «ВК» Technology partner  VK play VK Play is a platform for game lovers, developers and content creators. VK Play combines all the services that are in demand among the gaming community and offers entertainment for everyone: a catalog of games, cloud gaming, streaming and eSports and much more. The site offers games for every taste - from light puzzles to hardcore action with the ability to launch games through the cloud gaming service from any PC. For eSports fans, VK Play also hosts amateur and professional, open and exclusive eSports tournaments.   Реклама. ООО «СИМ» Media partner Championat.com Championat.com, one of the globe leading sports portals, offers a complete immersion into the world of sports. It provides detailed real-time match statistics, exclusive interviews with iconic athletes, major sporting events news and analytics, rankings, photos and videos, live broadcasts and podcasts. Additionally, it offers tips for those interested in a healthy lifestyle, reviews of esports, mobile games, movies and TV shows. The portal has 15 thematic channels on social media based on different sports types and interests. Championat.com is recognized as the leader among sports portals on the Russian-speaking Web /according to LiveInternet, Russia, 2023/, and one of the top 4 sports internet media in the world /according to SimilarWeb, 2022/. Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament








  Menu  Profile     English RussianLiga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey TournamentThe Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament will take place in Kazan, with the winner earning the right to compete in the Games of the Future-2024. The competition will be held at the Tatneft Arena on November 23-24.PlaceISP "Tatneft Arena" KazanDates23 November - 24 November 2023 yearPhygital Hockey: hockey simulator + hockey 3x3Six teams of eleven athletes each compete in the tournament. In each match, they compete in digital and physical stages.
 
Digital Stage (hockey video game)Interactive hockey matches are played in the 3-on-3 format that consists of three periods of 3 minutes each, adhering to the rules of interactive hockey. Teams must make one full simultaneous substitution of three players during the stage.
 
Physical stage (hockey 3x3)Four athletes are playing for each team in a match, including three skaters and one goalkeeper. Each team has three athletes as substitutes. Match consists of three periods of seven minutes each.
 
ScoringThe winner of a match is determined by the sum of goals scored at the digital and physical stages. In case of equality, the winner will be determined by the penalty shot series.Videophygital games 10/2023Discover Games of the Future! page_content:
Liga Pro Team - Победители турнира «Путь Чемпиона» по фиджитал-баскетболу








  Menu  Profile     English RussianLiga Pro Team Crowned Champions of the Way of a Champion Phygital Basketball Tournament10/8/2023Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетболLiga Pro TeamТопThe Way of the Champion phygital basketball tournament has finished in Kazan. Liga Pro Team triumphed as the competition’s winners, while team  U.R. secured second place, and RODINA MEDIA rounded out the top three.The competition consists of two stages. First, the teams play in a basketball simulator, then move to a real court, where they play 2x2 basketball. The scores of the two stages are summed up. In case of a tie, the winner is determined by a series of free throws.U.R. 23:32 Liga Pro TeamВ финальном поединке сошлись U.R. и Liga Pro Team. Во время цифрового поединка игроки U.R. оказали трехкратному чемпиону России по кибербаскетболу Михаилу Панченко (Liga Pro Team) достойное сопротивление, завершив виртуальный поединок с отставанием в одно очко – 14:15. Однако, матч на баскетбольном паркете прошел при абсолютном преимуществе Liga Pro Team, которым удалось одержать победу над соперником за три минуты. Матч закончился со счетом 23:32. Liga Pro Team стали обладателем трофея десятых Фиджитал Игр и выиграли квоту на Игры Будущего."I'm thrilled that I could help the team win the tournament. We swapped roles a bit today because I played terribly in the digital part, and we were saved by Shalva Shatashvili, who made some crucial shots. And he recently started playing the simulator. We'll prepare for the Games of the Future; the level of competition will be much higher. A lot of foreign players, whom I know well, and among them, very strong opponents, have already come to the international Phygital Games tournament," shared Mikhail Panchenko, a player from Liga Pro Team."We managed to compete on the console, but on the court, we couldn't provide a strong resistance. We were initially gearing up for a strong opponent. Well, all that's left is to congratulate our rivals; they fairly became the tournament winners. But we are delighted with our performance. It turned out to be a beautiful tournament," shared Vladislav Bechkov, a player from the U.R. team.1/5UNICS 27:31 RODINA MEDIAIn the match for third place, UNICS  and RODINA MEDIA faced off. The digital game was tight, with teams striving to quickly recover so the score wouldn't impact the physical part of the competition. The teams took to the LED court with a score of 15:13 in favor of the Kazan team. RODINA MEDIA basketball players Maxim Pogodin POGODA and Igor Sukhov-Mazin SUHAR immediately entered the fray, quickly making precise long-range shots to recover from their deficit and won the match with a score of 27:31. RODINA MEDIA concluded the tournament in third place."We performed well in the tournament, are pleased with the third place, but wanted the first. This was our first time at such an event. The Phygital Games are a cool show and a spectacular tournament. We really enjoyed it, the organization was superb, and we'd be happy to participate in similar competitions in the future," shared Maxim Pogodin, a player from the RODINA MEDIA team."Of course, we are dissatisfied. We couldn't deliver a commendable performance in front of our fans. In the match for third place, we should have secured the physical part, but our opponents made their shots. Perhaps, we couldn’t recover after an unsuccessful semifinal, couldn’t get into the right mindset. This is sport; we will make corrections for the next tournaments," said Ilya Rusakov, a player from UNICS. 1/5October 9th marks the kickoff of the International Phygital Basketball Tournament, taking place within the framework of the tenth Phygital Games at the Kazan Expo, Kazan. The Phygital Games had total prize money of 4 million rubles, of which 1,4 million rubles will go to the winners.Tickets can be purchased on the website kassir.ru.During the tenth Phygital Games the competition program featured five phygital disciplines: phygital basketball, phygital football, computer games CS:GO and Warface combined with laser tag and Mobile Legends: Bang Bang online tournament. Athletes from China, Spain, Turkey, Belarus, Azerbaijan and other countries will participate in the Games. metadata.title: Liga Pro Team - Победители турнира «Путь Чемпиона» по фиджитал-баскетболу
metadata.description: Завершился турнир «Путь Чемпиона» по фиджитал-баскетболу в Казани. Победителем соревнований стала команда Liga Pro Team, второе место завоевал коллектив U.R., тройку замкнула RODINA MEDIA. По правилам фиджитал-баскетбола команды должны сначала показать навыки игры в баскетбольном симуляторе, затем на паркете сыграть в баскетбол 2х2. Победитель определяется по сумме заброшенных мячей на двух этапах

page_content:
Осенью в Казани пройдут юбилейные Фиджитал Игры








  Menu  Profile     English RussianKazan will host the tenth-anniversary Phygital Games9/22/2023АнонсФиджитал Игры 10October 5-22 best phygital athletes from all over the world will compete in five innovative disciplines to win quotas for Games of the Future 2024. Disciplines: phygital basketball, phygital football, computer games CS:GO/Warface + laser tag, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.On October 5-22, Kazan will host the tenth-anniversary Phygital Games just 123 days before the main sports competition of 2024 - the Games of the Future. The competition program featured five phygital disciplines: phygital basketball, phygital football, computer games CS:GO and Warface combined with laser tag and Mobile Legends: Bang Bang online tournament. Athletes from China, Spain, Turkey, Belarus, Azerbaijan and other countries will participate in the Games.Phygital basketball: basketball video game + basketball 2x2Phygital basketball will open the program of the anniversary Phygital Games. The competition consists of two tournaments: The Way of the Champion (Russian tournament) and the International tournament. Basketball in the phygital format is designed to test the skills of athletes both in a basketball video game and on a basketball court. In the digital part, players fight in a basketball video game, and then with the points scored in the virtual part, they play basketball 2x2 and determine the winner on the court. Venue: Kazan Expo.Way of the Champion (Russian tournament): Group stage: 5/6 October 2023; quarter-finals and semi-finals: 7 October 2023; final and battle for third place: 8 October 2023.International tournament: Group stage: 9/10 October 2023; quarter-finals and semi-finals: 11 October 2023; final and battle for third place: 12 October 2023.Phygital football: football video game + football 5x5The physical football tournament will also consist of two tournaments: The Way of the Champion (Russian tournament) and the International tournament. Athletes from Nigeria, Chile, Tunisia, Thailand, Azerbaijan and Belarus will come to the capital of the Republic of Tatarstan.Football in the phygital format is designed to test the skills of athletes both in a football video game and on a mini football field. In the digital part, players fight in a football video game, and then with the points scored in the virtual part, they play football 5x5 and determine the winner on the field. Venue: Iskander.Way of the Champion (Russian tournament): Group stage: 12/13 October 2023; quarter-finals and semi-finals: 14 October 2023; final and battle for third place: 15 October 2023. International tournament: Group stage: 18/19 October 2023; quarter-finals and semi-finals: 20 October 2023; final and battle for third place: 21 October 2023.MOBA: Mobile Legends: Bang BangMOBA in the phygital format is designed to test the skills of athletes in the Mobile Legends: Bang Bang. On October 12, teams will be competing in the online tournament for the Phygital Games' trophy. Group stage: 12/15 October 2023; quarter-finals: 19/20 October 2023; semi-finals: 21 October 2023; final and match for third place: 22 October 2023. Phygital tactical battle: CS:GO + Laser TagTactical combat in the phygital format is designed to test the skills of athletes both in the CS:GO and in the Laser Tag arena.On October 18, four teams will compete for the Phygital Games' trophy. Venue: Kazan Expo. The Phygital Super Final will take place at the Miras Stadium.Four teams of six athletes each compete in the tournament. In the group stage, teams play only in the CS:GO; starting from the semi-final matches, in case of a draw in the digital stage, teams determine a winner in the physical stage (Laser Tag arena). Group stage: 18/19 October 2023; semi-finals: 20 October 2023; final and battle for third place: 21 October 2023.   Phygital superfinal: October 22, Miras Stadium.Phygital tactical battle: Warface + Laser TagTactical combat in the phygital format is designed to test the skills of athletes both in the Warface and in the Laser Tag arena.On October 18, four teams will compete for the Phygital Games' trophy. Venue: Kazan Expo. The Phygital Super Final will take place at the Miras Stadium.Four teams of six athletes each compete in the tournament. In the group stage, teams play only in the Warface computer game; starting from the semi-final matches, in case of a draw in the digital stage, teams determine a winner in the physical stage (Laser Tag arena). Group stage: 18/19 October 2023; semi-finals: 20 October 2023; final and battle for third place: 21 October 2023.Phygital superfinal: October 22, Miras Stadium.also 12/2023Draw for the Games of the Future to Take Place at VDNH Games of the Future 11/2023Media accreditation process for the Games of the Future АккредитацияИгры БудущегоСМИ 11/2023Liga Pro Team Secures Spot at the Games of the Future Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023NBSK and Liga Pro Team to Face Off in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Tournament Final Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Tournament Semifinalists Decided in Kazan Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Teams Learn Their Group Stage Opponents Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Zaripov Team will compete in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey... фиджитал-хоккейИгры БудущегоЛига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею 10/2023Liga Pro Team Crowned Champions of the Way of a Champion Phygital Basketball Tournament Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023International Phygital Basketball Teams Determined Group Stage Rivals Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Топ 10/2023Way of a Champion: Unveiling the Playoff Contenders in the Phygital Basketball  Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023Russian Phygital Basketball Players Step Onto the Way of a Champion Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Путь Чемпиона 10/2023Phygital Games 10: Basketball Players Discover Group Stage Opponents ЛучшееФиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10 9/2023Phygital Games 10: How to Get Your Ticket? page_content: Menu  Profile     English RussianOperation of radio electronic appliances at Phygital Games 109/28/2023Фиджитал Игры 10СМИLegal basis for the use of radio equipment (REAs) in the territory of the Russian Federation is established by the Law of the Russian Federation and normative legal acts on communications. According to the p.1 of the Article 24 of the Federal Law dated July 7, 2003 No 126-FZ On Communications, the right to use the radio frequency spectrum is provided by the elimination and assignment of radio channels and assignment of radio channels.In accordance with the requirements of the current legislation in the field of communications, the use of radio frequency spectrum without the appropriate authorization is not allowed. Assignment of a radio frequency or radio frequency channel is carried out by the Federal Service for Supervision in the Sphere of Communications, Information Technologies and Mass Communications (Roskomnadzor) taking into account the results of the examination of electromagnetic compatibility conducted by the authorized organization of the radio frequency service (FSUE "GRFC") in accordance with the Procedure for the examination of the possibility of using the declared radioelectronic means and their electromagnetic compatibility with the existing and planned for use radioelectronic systems.The executive organization of the International Multi-Sports Tournament "Games of the Future 2024" in Kazan - ANO Directorate of Sports and Social Projects, in cooperation with Roskomnadzor within the framework of the relevant joint agreements and adopted documents, carries out activities to manage the radio frequency spectrum and REAs on the territory of Kazan and in the adjacent areas of the Republic of Tatarstan during the preparation and holding at the Games.The Directorate shall take additional measures to restrict the use of REAs at the Games venues aimed at ensuring interference-free use of the radio frequency spectrum in the interests of the Games. In order to allow REAs to enter at the Games venues, each REAs user, with the exception of REAs specified in the List of REAs used without restrictions (hereinafter referred to as the List), shall be obliged to obtain a permit for the use of radio frequencies or radio frequency channels for civil REAs.During the period of events at the Games venues, Roskomnadzor employees will carry out radio control activities and identify REAs operating in violation.In order to process a radio frequency authorization, an application for the use of REAs at Phygital Games 10 must be submitted. The completed application form should be sent to radio@dspkazan.comAPPLICATION FOR THE USE OF REASTypes of REAsREAs include a wide range of radio transmitting devices for any purpose, the main types of which are listed below:In accordance with the Procedure of Examination for Possibility to Use Declared REAs and Their Electromagnetic Compatibility with Active and Planned REAs, Considering Materials and Taking Decisions on Assignment of Radio Frequencies and Radio Frequency Channels within Allocated Radio Frequency Bands, approved by the decision of the State Commission of Radio Frequencies dated 7 November 2016 No 16-39-01, the RFC obtaining procedure was obligatory for the following types of REAs intended for use at the Games:Wireless Fixed Link;Microwave Mobile Link;Fixed Satellite Link;Satellite News Gathering;Land Mobile Radio Service\Talk Back System\Handheld Radio Service;Cordless Camera;In Ear Monitor System;Interpretation Service System;Telemetry & Telecommand;Wireless Microphone;Wireless LAN;List of REAs used without restrictions*:Base stations of mobile network providers;Assistive listening devices (ALDs) for hearing impaired people;Car alarms;Customer premise equipment supporting Wi-Fi, including built-in Wi-Fi;Radio electronic devices supporting Bluetooth, including built-in Bluetooth;For all questions related to the use of REAs at the Games venues, please contact us at radio@dspkazan.com*There can be changes or updates to the list.   Menu  Profile     English RussianPhygital Games 10: Basketball Players Discover Group Stage Opponents10/4/2023ЛучшееФиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10ТопThe draw procedure for phygital basketball on the eve of the first competitive day of the tenth Phygital Games took place in Kazan. According to the results of the draw, teams of the tournament determined their rivals for the group stage. The “Way of a Champion”  phygital basketball tournament will take place at the Kazan Expo from October 5 to 8.According to the draw procedure, the pairs were distributed as follows*:Group A*:11:30 UNICS vs RFSO Lokomotiv12:35 RODINA MEDIA vs Liga Pro Team Group B*:13:40 U.R. vs UGRA. Reset14:45 SFU vs Liga Pro Team 47*Games are held in the followed by format.The competition consists of two stages. First, the teams play in a basketball simulator, then move to a real court, where they play 2x2 basketball. The scores of the two stages are summed up. In case of a tie, the winner is determined by a series of free throws.The “Way of a Champion” phygital basketball tournament is held within the framework of the tenth Phygital Games at the Kazan Expo, Kazan. The total prize fund amounts to 1.25 million rubles. Tickets can be purchased on the kassir.ru website.During the tenth Phygital Games the competition program featured five phygital disciplines: phygital basketball, phygital football, computer games CS:GO and Warface combined with laser tag and Mobile Legends: Bang Bang online tournament. Athletes from China, Spain, Turkey, Belarus, Azerbaijan and other countries will participate in the Games. Menu  Profile     English Russian Volunteers - Games of the Future  
 
 


 

 Volunteers for Games of the Future       WHAT IS GAMES OF THE FUTURE? Games of the Future 2024 in Kazan is a massive, innovative event that will revolutionize the world of sports. Over 10 competitive days, we anticipate welcoming tens of thousands of guests from around the world, preparing 6 competition venues, successfully hosting 21 phygital disciplines, and much more.Within the competitive disciplines, traditional sports will be combined with e-sports, and some disciplines will only be possible for superheroes, who are well versed in new trends and technological developments.     HOW TO BECOME A VOLUNTEER? The volunteer program embodies the vision of the 2024 Games of the Future in Kazan: openness, inclusivity, and equality. We are recruiting a multinational, open and cross-border team of volunteers who are ready to create the sport of the future with us.     THREE SUPERPOWERS THAT A "GAMES OF THE FUTURE" VOLUNTEER HAVE be 14+ (for Kazan residents) or 18+ (for volunteers from other cities and countries)speak one or more foreign languages (as a plus when selecting a candidate)be ready to go through all stages of selection and training, arrive in Kazan and go out on shifts for the Games     THE GAMES VOLUNTEER PROGRAM IN NUMBERS     2000 volunteers 20 functional areas 30 certified volunteer program centers in every region of Russia     Siberian Federal District  Far Eastern Federal District Ural Federal District Northwestern Federal District  Volga Federal District  Southern Federal District  North Caucasian Federal District  Central Federal District      THE GAMES VOLUNTEER PROGRAM STAGES     2023 2024 March September December February opportunity to apply for a volunteer role. based on submitted applications. March - December 1, 2023  September - December 30, 2023 January - February 2024 February 21, 2024  Application Campaign  Recruitment and Selection of Volunteers Volunteer Training Kick-off of the Games of the Future in Kazan. Menu  Profile     English Russian Phygital Centers  


 Phygital Centers     Phygital Centers Phygital centers are sports venues of the new generation, where a unified and harmonious space is created for improving skills in both traditional and digital sports. These centers not only have sports grounds and areas for computer and console games, but also sections for virtual reality. Phygital centers offer a completely new approach to sports engagement.         Phygital centers are integrated into a unified ecosystem including computers equipped with special software, a website, and a mobile application for guests and professional athletes. These technological solutions allow participants of the phygital movement to book sports and gaming areas, participate in center events, and promptly track training sessions and competition results, both on sports grounds and in computer games.  Through their personal phygital profiles, they can receive statistical data on progress and levels of physical and digital activity.     THE PROJECT PROVIDES TWO TYPES OF PHYGITAL CENTERS     The first type is a semi-covered phygital center.  It includes open sports grounds (mini-football field, streetball court, workout zone), as well as indoor administrative and gaming areas (food court, computer room, areas for games consoles and virtual reality).         The second type is an indoor phygital center. It can be implemented in a typical format (all sports and gaming areas are located in a single indoor center) or in an individual format (specialized indoor centers such as a hockey rink, laser tag arena, skate park, etc.).         Phygital centers Phygital centers have the necessary infrastructure for conducting training sessions, team competitions, and educational courses to develop and popularize the phygital movement. The most active athletes and teams training in these centers will have a unique opportunity to be included in the list of participants for qualifying tournaments for Games of the Future.     Phygital centers are a focal point for active youth!
