В Казани пройдет отборочный турнир по фиджитал-хоккею на Игры Будущего-2024








  Menu  Profile     English RussianZaripov Team will compete in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament11/13/2023фиджитал-хоккейИгры БудущегоЛига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюThe Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament will take place in Kazan, with the winner earning the right to compete in the Games of the Future-2024. The competition will be held at the Tatneft Arena on November 23-24.The tournament will feature six Russian teams, including winners of the regional stages of phygital hockey, participants from media leagues, and popular bloggers. Competing for a spot in the Games of the Future-2024 will be Liga Pro Team (Moscow), NBSK (Moscow), ZaryaD (Kazan), RFSO Lokomotiv (Moscow), HK Butyrka (Voronezh), and 3FRENZY (Moscow).The tournament has attracted the attention of professional esports athletes and hockey players. The Liga Pro Team lineup will include Pavel Zdunov, the KHL's Best Rookie of 2010/11, and Vladimir Malinovsky, a 2014 Gagarin Cup holder. The ZaryaD team will be led by one of the most decorated Russian hockey players, former Ak Bars forward Danis Zaripov. His son, Arthur, is listed as a player for ZaryaD.According to the tournament rules, matches will consist of two stages: digital and physical. First, teams play interactive hockey on a console in a 3-on-3 format for three periods, each lasting three minutes. Then, athletes play on the ice for three periods of 7 minutes of pure time each, following the rules of 3-on-3 hockey. Goals scored in both stages are totaled, and in the event of a tie, teams will determine the winner in a shootout series.Following the preliminary stage, the top two teams from each group will advance to the semi-finals. The tournament regulations also include matches for third and fifth places.Schedule for the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey Tournament:November 23 - group stage (12:00)November 24 - semi-finals (11:15)Matches for 3-rd and 5-th places (14:00)Finals (21:00)Previously, the winners of the phygital hockey tournaments were team Cosmos (December 2022) and Ak Bars (June 2023).also 12/2023Draw for the Games of the Future to Take Place at VDNH Games of the Future 11/2023Media accreditation process for the Games of the Future АккредитацияИгры БудущегоСМИ 11/2023Liga Pro Team Secures Spot at the Games of the Future Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023NBSK and Liga Pro Team to Face Off in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Tournament Final Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Tournament Semifinalists Decided in Kazan Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Phygital Hockey Teams Learn Their Group Stage Opponents Лига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккеюФиджитал-хоккей 11/2023Zaripov Team will compete in the Liga Stavok Way of a Champion Phygital Hockey... фиджитал-хоккейИгры БудущегоЛига Ставок Путь Чемпиона по фиджитал-хоккею 10/2023Liga Pro Team Crowned Champions of the Way of a Champion Phygital Basketball Tournament Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023International Phygital Basketball Teams Determined Group Stage Rivals Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Топ 10/2023Way of a Champion: Unveiling the Playoff Contenders in the Phygital Basketball  Фиджитал Игры 10Путь ЧемпионаФиджитал-баскетбол 10/2023Russian Phygital Basketball Players Step Onto the Way of a Champion Фиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10Путь Чемпиона 10/2023Phygital Games 10: Basketball Players Discover Group Stage Opponents ЛучшееФиджитал-баскетболФиджитал Игры 10 9/2023Phygital Games 10: How to Get Your Ticket? Events








  Menu  Profile     English Russian Events

 Press-center       If you are a representative mass-media and want to receive information mailing and invitations to events, please, write to us to the press-service e-mail:, or add the Request for Comment Request for Commentmedia@gofuture.games     accreditation If you want to work at «The Games of the Future» tournament as media representative, blogger or influencer, you must be accredited from November 20, 2023 to February 5, 2024.Foreign media representatives must complete accreditation by January 21, 2024, if they require an invitation letter for a Russian visa application. Fill Out the FormFor a media representative with a list of several journalists from one media Fill Out the FormFor individual completion by a journalist Fill Out the FormFor bloggers and influencers If you have any questions regarding accreditation, visa support, customs procedures, accommodation in media hotels, arrivals and departures at official points of entry, equipment registration with RES, or media transportation in Kazan, please write to us at press-service@gofuture.games     Guidelines for Media during the GAMES OF THE FUTURE  In order to learn about the facilities of the Games of the Future and main services, please refer to the Media Guide.
